mapper.select: SELECT vehicle tkey, vehicle_name tname, SUM(users) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_vehicletype WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY vehicle

SELECT from_provno tkey, from_provno_name tname, SUM(SUM) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_passengersource WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < create_time AND hour_id="22" GROUP BY from_provno ORDER BY tvalue DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT nDay tkey, nDay tname, SUM(peopleNum) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_staytime WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < create_time GROUP BY nDay ORDER BY tkey

SELECT scenic_code tkey, scenic_name tname, SUM(SUM) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_scenicflowhours WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) < create_time GROUP BY scenic_code ORDER BY tvalue DESC
SELECT totalFee tkey, totalFee tname, SUM(num) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_userportrait WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < create_time GROUP BY totalFee LIMIT 3

SELECT t_appcode.appsmalltype tkey, t_appcode.appsmalltype tname, SUM(t_touristapp.num) tvalue FROM t_travelbigscreen_appcode t_appcode, t_travelbigscreen_touristapp t_touristapp WHERE t_appcode.appbigtype_id = t_touristapp.appBigType AND t_appcode.appsmalltype_id = t_touristapp.appSmallType AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) < t_touristapp.create_time GROUP BY tkey ORDER BY tvalue DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id,hour_id),'%Y%m%d%H') tkey, hour_id tname, SUM(usersum) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_scenicflowhours WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 HOUR) < STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id,hour_id),'%Y%m%d%H') GROUP BY tkey ORDER BY tkey DESC LIMIT 24) tmptable ORDER BY tkey

SELECT * FROM (SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id),'%Y%m%d') tkey, day_id tname, SUM(SUM) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_scenicflowhours WHERE hour_id = '22' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 DAY) < STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY tkey ORDER BY tkey DESC LIMIT 7) tmptable ORDER BY tkey

SELECT * FROM (SELECT STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id,hour_id),'%Y%m%d') tkey, day_id tname, SUM(SUM) tvalue FROM wz_big_sc.t_travelbigscreen_scenicflowhours WHERE hour_id ='22' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 32 DAY) < STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(month_id,day_id),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY tkey ORDER BY tkey DESC LIMIT 30) tmptable ORDER BY tkey
